lines.text: [while drinking Long Island Iced Tea]
These are some good cups of tea, man.
I got his machine. Should I leave a message?
Yeah. Tell him he's about to copulate with a creature from outer space.
[Preston laughs and Laura smiles]

[Stephen and Sil have just finished having sex. Sil seems distant for a second, but then chuckles excitedly]
What?
I felt it!
Felt what?
It's started!
What's started?
Life!
Oh, my darling girl!
[laughs condeceningly]
Now, I know in some south african tribes women believe they know the exact moment of conception, but really...
Don't you beleive me? Here, feel!
[She grabs his hand and holds it against her belly]

[Stephen does indeed feel something in Sil's womb and his smile suddenly fades]
Holy Shit!
[Sil covers Stephen's mouth to muffle his screams as she transforms into her alien form and kills him]
We decided to make it female so it would be more docile and controllable.
More docile and controllable, eh? You guys don't get out much.
A train came through here about the time she escaped.
Is she that fast?
She is *that* fast.
No one ever asked me to find anything they didn't want dead.
I feel sorry for you.
Yeah? That's great. I feel sorry for her.

[to Sil, after they finished having sex]
Oh my dear... I enjoyed that immensely!

[on Laura's perfume]
Smells nice. Can I try some?
Yeah, help yourself.
Does it work on your boyfriend?
Yeah, as a repellent.
[walks away]
I thought I was dead.
I thought you'd drank your last Long Island Iced Tea there, Dan.
Yeah, I thought we all had. Hey, you okay?
Yeah, I'm okay. My pants are a little messed up, but I'm okay.
She was half us, half something else. I wonder which was the predatory half.
The dead half. Let's get the hell out of here.
Oh, no. I think someone's at the door.
Don't go. Please. I want a baby.

[shocked]
*What?* Excuse me?
Criminologist says there's no evidence of semen in the hot tub water.
Well, maybe she took it with.
Let go of him you motherfucker.
[first lines]
I'm sorry.

[mouthing]
I'm sorry.
[last lines]
Ahh! I never thought I'd be so happy to be back in a sewer.

[Last line before Sil pounces on him, naked and they have sex]
What about protection?

[Seconds after meeting him, the beautiful Sil is undressing and trying to seduce Stephen]
This sort of thing doesn't usually happen to me.

[to his surprise, Stephen walks in to his motel room to find a stranger, Sil, standing inside listening through the wall to a couple having sex in a neighboring room]
Who are you? What are you doing here?
I saw you downstairs, but you were with all those people.
[She approaches him, slipping the shoulder straps off her dress to expose her breasts]
Wh... What are you doing?
[Sil kisses him]
It's not too soon for us to be together.
[She kisses him again. Stephen stops resisting and starts undressing, himself]
Something bad happened here...
